dcterms:description: APT data sets are used to model the behavior of APT attackers and evaluate the performance of reinforcement learning algorithms in simulating attacks.
dcterms:title: APT data sets

dcterms:description: The Mitre ATT&CK framework provides a comprehensive knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques based on real-world observations.
dcterms:title: Mitre ATT&CK

dcterms:description: The ENISA threat landscape report provides insights into ransomware attacks, detailing trends, techniques, and mitigation strategies.
dcterms:title: ENISA threat landscape for ransomware attacks

dcterms:description: The attack graph dataset provides a structured representation of potential attack paths in a network, useful for analyzing and defending against cyber threats.
dcterms:title: Attack graph

dcterms:creator: A. H. Anwar
C. A. Kamhoua
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on cyber deception strategies using honeypots, exploring allocation and diversity to enhance security measures.
dcterms:title: Cyber deception using honeypot allocation and diversity

dcterms:description: This dataset utilizes open source intelligence to discover and interpret malicious behaviors, aiding in cybersecurity efforts.
dcterms:title: Open source intelligence for malicious behavior discovery
